duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement innovation programs within the PE/PP Technology teams focusing on different technology platforms and market applications.
Lead and drive highly motivated, impactful, innovative research programs on application development in partnership with cross-functional stakeholders.
Translate customer requirements, specifications, and expectations into clear application engineering and processing plans.
Work in a multidisciplinary setting within the Technology & Innovation organization collaborating with different disciplines (business, manufacturing, market-facing organizations).
Define, execute, and manage development projects, align goals and priorities and identify the activities and resources needed to achieve these goals.

Develop and communicate a vision of new developments in polyolefin process, catalyst, and application technologies, assess competitor landscape and define gaps and opportunities to improve SABIC’s product portfolio.
Translate business and/or T&I strategy into plans, guide and coach junior colleagues in the field of material science and maintain scientific standards of the reports.

education_certification.credential: MSc or PhD in chemical/process engineering, catalysis, or material science
